attributes.title: Research and Development
attributes.description:
Source: http://www.hondaresearch.com/contact.cfm
Los Angeles Center
Torrance, California

The Los Angeles Center has the challenging and exciting responsibility of envisioning the products customers will want tomorrow - and beyond. The focus here is on product planning, market research, styling design and engineering research. In addition, our LA associates strive to balance the needs of the individual with environmental and safety concerns. The Los Angeles Center has evolved from an emphasis on concept cars to the design of mass production vehicles manufactured at Honda's production facilities in the U.S. and Canada.
